Last month I introduced a bill to expand mental health services. I sent it around to every office, Democratic and Republican. Yet the only people who have joined the bill are Ds.

The truth is mental health is just a talking point to distract from gun violence for most Rs. https://t.co/vAOnuCsF7i

There is no way we can truly repay those who courageously worked at Ground Zero.

Providing for their health care is the least we can do. Share this resource if you are someone or you know someone whose health was impacted from working at Ground Zero: https://t.co/ixikFsVGiv
But more than just honoring their sacrifice in words, I have fought to ensure they receive health care and compensation through the World Trade Center Health and Compensation Program.

Our brave 9/11 responders are still dying from the health impacts of being at Ground Zero.

This week, at the 20th anniversary commemoration of the end of clean up and rescue efforts I honored their sacrifice.

There is no rest or reprieve from the deluge of mass shootings in America.

Tonight, Tulsa has become the latest city to pay the bloody cost of inaction, deliberate obstruction, and the gun lobby's grip on Washington. 

Enough is enough ‚Äî action cannot wait. https://t.co/pRYNPaNTCX
